name: Impact Velocity Racing (pre-alpha)
description:
Windows and Android downloads available!


Impact Velocity is a smashing racing game featuring powerups, destructible environments and AI-controlled racing rivals. Compete for first place or explore the map to find secrets...

Warning: Impact Velocity is still in PRE-ALPHA. Gameplay experience is subject to change over time.

Keyboard Controls:

  • A/S - Steer
  • W -Accelerate
  • S -Reverse
  • Space - Handbrake
  • Left Shift - Activate TurboCharge item

Xbox Gamepad Controls: (Only supported gamepad currently, sorry)

  • Left Stick - Steer
  • Right Trigger -Accelerate
  • Left Trigger -Reverse
  • B Button - Handbrake
  • Y Button - Activate TurboCharge item

Android controls should be fairly self-explanatory.
